articles.title: Bette Nash: World's longest-serving flight attendant dies at 88 - BBC.com
articles.description: Bette Nash began working with the forerunner of American Airlines in 1957 and never retired from the job.
articles.content:
Bette Nash, the world's longest-serving flight attendant, has died aged 88 after nearly 70 years of airborne service.
The news was broken by her employer, American Airlines, which mourned her death … [+1182 chars]

articles.author: Rebecca Rubin
articles.title: Box Office: ‘Furiosa’ Just Barely Beats ‘The Garfield Movie’ in Disastrous Memorial Day Weekend — the Worst in Decades - Variety
articles.description: In a box office nail biter, "Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga" emerged victorious over "The Garfield Movie" on North American charts.
articles.content:
Garfield has another reason to hate Mondays.
In a box office nail biter, “Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga” narrowly emerged victorious over “The Garfield Movie” on North American charts. On Sunday, Warner B… [+2321 chars]
